CustomField.formula: BillingStreet__c + ' ' + BillingHouseNo__c + IF(ISNULL(BillingHouseNoExt__c), '', ' ' + BillingHouseNoExt__c) + IF(ISNULL(BillingAddressExt__c), '', BR() + BillingAddressExt__c) + BillingPostalCode__c + ' ' + BillingCity__c + IF(ISNULL(BillingCityExt__c), '', ' ' + BillingCityExt__c)
CustomField.label: Rechnungsadresse
